title: Semester 6 Registration Reminder
message: Please complete your semester 6 registration on ERP portal before 25 January 2025.

title: Pending Fee Payment
message: Your semester fee of ₹26,000 is pending. Please clear dues to avoid late penalty.

title: Hostel Fee Due
message: Please pay your hostel fees for Semester 6 before 30 January 2025.

title: Backlog Exam Registration Open
message: Backlog exam registration is open till 5 February 2025. Register through ERP.

title: Placement Drive – Adani Group
message: Adani Group campus drive scheduled on 10 February 2025. Eligible students must register.

title: Scholarship Approved
message: Your Minority Community Scholarship has been approved. Amount will be credited soon.

title: Library Book Overdue
message: One issued library book is overdue. Please return it to avoid fine.

title: Internal Marks Correction Window
message: Submit internal marks correction request before 3 February 2025.

title: Transport Pass Renewal
message: Your transport pass will expire on 10 February 2025. Please renew it.

title: Admission Confirmed
message: Congratulations! Your admission for B.Tech 2025 batch has been confirmed.
